```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```




Load Dependencies
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
library(lubridate)
library(ggplot2)
```

Load Datasets
```{r}
CO <- read_excel("./data/CO.xlsx", skip = 4)
NO2 <- read_excel("./data/NO2.xlsx", skip = 4)
NOX <- read_excel("./data/NOX.xlsx", skip = 3)
O3 <- read_excel("./data/O3.xlsx", skip = 3)
PM25 <- read_excel("./data/PM25.xlsx", skip = 5)
SO2 <- read_excel("./data/SO2.xlsx", , skip = 7)
TRS <- read_excel("./data/TRS.xlsx", skip = 3)
```

Head of Data
```{r}
head(CO)
head(NO2)
head(NOX)
head(PM25)
head(SO2)
head(TRS)


```

```{r}
CO = CO %>% mutate(Year = as.integer(Year), .before = Year) %>% 
NO2 = NO2 %>% mutate(Year = as.integer(Year), .before = Year)
```


Visualizing
```{r}
x = left_join(CO, NO2, by = join_by("Year", "City"), suffix = c(".CO", ".NO2"))
x = left_join(x, NOX, by = year)
x = left_join(x, PM25)
x = left_join(x, SO2)


```


```{r}
ggplot(x, aes(x = Year, y = as.double(Mean.CO), col = City)) + geom_point() 


```
